## Load Packages

Load leaflet and other required packages:

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(sf)     
library(dplyr)   
library(ggplot2)
```


## Set Working Directory

```{r}
setwd("/users/wolfgangschwalenberg/desktop/dh-mapping/mapping_data")
```


## Read-In Data

Read-in the source data, named "sheet1"

```{r}
sheet1 <- st_read("sheet1.shp")
```

## Map Data + Add Pop-ups

Using leaflet, map the data
Also add markers.
Add Pop-ups to the markers which will display the "Selected Newspapers" from the data sheet.

```{r}
leaflet(data = sheet1) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(data = sheet1, lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, popup = paste0("<b>Selected Newspapers:</b> ", sheet1$newspapers)) %>%
  setView(100,33,4)
```
